name: The Horror Museum
description:
The Horror Museum is a game about a cripple in a wheelchair who has landed in a, well museum. 

The game focusses on suspense and small jumpscares. To progress you need to solve short puzzles or riddles. The total game should take around 10-20 minutes to complete, depending on how long you are staring at the beautiful art.

All the art in this game has been generated by artificial intelligence, including the music.   

This game has been made for the "AI and Games Jam 2022".
